Name: Phu thai

Name: Phu thai
Review Text: I lived in Bangkok for around four years, and Amsterdam the past five years. It's a wonderful time-space compression moment for me, this restaurant. It's neither Thailand nor Netherlands, at the same time it could be Bangkok or Amsterdam. It's a special place I highly recommend, with nice people and very good food.
